Title: Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner
Plot: Harvey and Mike find themselves on opposite sides of a takeover battle that threatens to turn into a knockdown, drag-out fight ? a fight complicated by Rachel?s relationship with Mike. Meanwhile, Louis finds himself partnered with recent SEC defector Jeff Malone in defending Pearson Specter from disgraced DA Eric Woodall.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
